Class IntegerUnixChannelOption

java.lang.Object
io.netty.util.AbstractConstant<ChannelOption<Integer>>
io.netty.channel.ChannelOption<Integer>
io.netty.channel.unix.UnixChannelOption<Integer>
io.netty.channel.unix.GenericUnixChannelOption<Integer>
io.netty.channel.unix.IntegerUnixChannelOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constant<ChannelOption<Integer>>, Comparable<ChannelOption<Integer>>
public final class IntegerUnixChannelOption extends GenericUnixChannelOption<Integer>
A GenericUnixChannelOption which uses an Integer as optval.
